description: Legacy zombie survival prototype that stress-tested my solo pipeline from spawn logic to live Steam deployment.

paragraphs: The survival loop leans on layered spawn controllers, object pooling, and AI steering that can pressure-test performance on older hardware.
I automated build uploads, crash symbolization, and feedback routing so every new patch pushed telemetry straight into my debugging stack.
RETRO TAKEAWAY: PLAYER HEATMAPS SURFACED BALANCE GAPS FASTER THAN QA AND STILL GUIDE HOW I PRIORITISE PATCHES.
